question:
Consider the following statements about the Pradhan Mantri Mahila Shakti Kendra Scheme (PMMSK):
  1. The scheme is part of Umbrella Scheme called “Mission for Protection and Empowerment for Women”
  2. It aims to improve declining child sex ratio (CSR) and empower the rural women
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. The scheme is part of Umbrella Scheme called“Mission for Protection and Empowerment for Women of the Union Ministry of Women and Child Development. <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The scheme aims to improve declining child sex ratio (CSR), and empower rural women. Through this scheme, government plans to reach 115 most backward districts in the country with 920 Mahila Shakti Kendra. Under the scheme a task force is to be created common for the national, state and district level. MSK will be implemented with a cost sharing pattern between the Central Government and the States as 60:40 for states, except in respect of North Eastern and Special Category States where the cost sharing ratio shall be 90:10. In the UTs the scheme will be implemented with 100% central funds. All payments made under the scheme must be through PFMS under DBT mode.
